name: reto-comu-pagina-nueva
description: Aplicación de monitoreo de sensores IoT con visualización 3D

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build && npm run deploy:s3 && npm run invalidate:cf
scripts.deploy:full:postgis: npm run build && npm run deploy:s3 && npm run deploy:postgis && npm run invalidate:cf
